data.text:
Each year on April 3rd, National Find A Rainbow Day challenges us to look to the sky and find a colourful ray of hope. But why not look a bit further? There are rainbows, and signs of hope, beautifully hidden all around - near and far! 

📸 IG@domryanphoto, wanderchu, harimaolee https://t.co/HNNaL9tyBY

data.text: This month, Jabeen Zafar brings us to Dockweiler State Beach in California, US. Home to an enclosure for the protected western snowy plover, this beach boasts 3.7 miles of gorgeous oceanfront. Its scenic bike trail is perfect for a leisurely cycle and watching the sunset!
Welcome back to the Cathay Fan Guided Tour! Every month, a fan is invited to share a hidden gem in their hometown, so we can travel the world from the comfort of our home. https://t.co/vmXpVTKWah

When a plane lands, its wings sometimes emit a strong cloak of cloud. This is due to lift forces that cause a sudden drop in air pressure and temperature, which can cause water vapour to condense into water droplets, which we see as clouds. Mystery solved!

📸 IG@reepair1556 https://t.co/GfCxViqOFL

@realkevinmasin Oh no, do you mind sending us the screenshot of the error, and let us know the browser version, as well as the membership details via DM? We will feed this back to the team.

@realkevinmasin Sorry to hear this Kevin, you may  close the browser completely and restart it to perform any search. Alternatively, you may use other browser to login. Sometimes clearing cookies and cache may help too.

Bauhinia x blakeana was discovered in Mount Davis, Hong Kong. It was eventually cultivated in the Botanic Gardens and can be now seen all over the city. What’s your favourite flower?

We look forward to welcoming you on board our flights, and bringing you closer to loved ones and fresh adventures across the globe.
#MoveBeyond #TillWeFlyAgain

Our aircrew are getting vaccinated

We simply can't wait to fly with you again, so our aircrew have been voluntarily receiving vaccinations. To prepare for the resumption of regular air travel, we have also been adhering to strict hygiene and safety standards. https://t.co/cJ1WHQceqL

We're honoured to work closely with the Airport Authority Hong Kong, The Commons Project and Prenetics on the introduction and trials of digital travel passes, so as to enable the safe reopening of borders and accommodate more travellers. Learn more: https://t.co/8zl9IXXbbn https://t.co/BNYhA0WBDZ

[Miles or cash? Enjoy the flexibility of both]

Turn your 21-day quarantine into a 21-day personal project! From getting in shape to catching up on your favourite TV series, how would you spend your time? Pause the GIF for some inspiration. Learn more about preparing for the quarantine at https://t.co/OSswkrnS4Y https://t.co/srSey54Rg2

Bold and iconic, the Cathay Pacific logo was first unveiled in 1994 on the Airbus A330. Its design reflects a single stroke of a calligrapher’s brush, which establishes our Asian identity and represents a bird in flight. Do you know what it’s called?

@HoldingsKk the next available flight from London to Hong Kong will be on 1 Apr.
@Ricardo_sheep Alternatively, you can also seek advice from local governmental authority. -Vinci (2/2)

@Ricardo_sheep We confirm that the ticket status are "open" and you may have to contact the travel agent to submit the refund request. Unfortunately that our only advice would be directing passenger to contact the agent again as airline is unable to intervene any. (1/2)
@Ricardo_sheep We will continue to assist you there. -Vinci
@Ricardo_sheep Thanks. We will wait for your DM. -Vinci

@Ricardo_sheep  We recommend you to remove your personal details from public tweet. Meanwhile, this is not our valid booking number. If you wish us to check for you, you may DM us with the 13-digit eTicket number and passenger name. -Vinci
